item.title: By: News
item.dc:creator: News
item.description: Editors aint got shit on Interpol!!! That writer Mark Beaumont is without a doubt, a complete and utter cunt. Clearly not up to date with his music and doesn't deserve that job i'd say. This is like saying you love Interpol but despise Joy Division. Interpol are definitely not a rip off of JD, but thier music definitely goes in the same catagory. As for Editors, they might not be high-jacking interpols shit, but they are DEFINITELY NOT, IN NO WAY SHAPE OR FORM BETTER..
item.content:encoded:
Editors aint got shit on Interpol!!! That writer Mark Beaumont is without a doubt, a complete and utter cunt. Clearly not up to date with his music and doesn’t deserve that job i’d say.
This is like saying you love Interpol but despise Joy Division.
Interpol are definitely not a rip off of JD, but thier music definitely goes in the same catagory.
As for Editors, they might not be high-jacking interpols shit, but they are DEFINITELY NOT, IN NO WAY SHAPE OR FORM BETTER..

item.title: By: victor
item.dc:creator: victor
item.description: I don't know that Editors can ever rival the presence and just unmistakeable cool that Interpol seem to be made of. And that translates directly into their music. Interpol are just superior. I like Editors a lot too though, no disrespect to them.
item.content:encoded: I don’t know that Editors can ever rival the presence and just unmistakeable cool that Interpol seem to be made of. And that translates directly into their music. Interpol are just superior. I like Editors a lot too though, no disrespect to them.
